txt.en: Shades of oathbreakers, cursed to remain after life has fled, haunt the Fields of Fornost. They are deadly in their hatred of all things that live and breathe.
You have defeated many shades in the western Fields of Fornost.
You have defeated many shades in the western Fields of Fornost.
Defeat shades in the western Fields of Fornost ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Shades can be found in the western Fields of Fornost.\n\nYou should defeat shades in the Fields of Fornost.
Shades of oathbreakers, cursed to remain after life has fled, haunt the Fields of Fornost. They are deadly in their hatred of all things that live and breathe.
